name: Slime Splitter
description:
Slime Splitter

An infinite tower-defense game about defending your tower from multiplying slimes!

How to play:

Shoot at the slimes to earn points.

The points can be exchanged for a less cooldown time which costs 10 points each.

Smaller slimes move slightly slower than bigger ones.

Try to beat you high score!
